sentences.en: At a lull in the entertainment the man looked at me and smiled.
sentences.cn: 在文娱节目中间休息的时候,那个男的看着我微笑.

sentences.en: During a lull in the fighting the Mobile Units can work at the Base Hospitals.
sentences.cn: 在战斗暂时停止时,战地医疗队可以在后方医院工作.

sentences.en: For a space there was a lull in the AchehJohore struggle.
sentences.cn: 亚齐和柔佛的争斗停息了一段时期.

sentences.en: Ground fighting flared up again after a two - week lull.
sentences.cn: 经过两个星期的平静之后,地面战又突然爆发了.

sentences.en: Ground fighting flared up again after a twoweek lull.
sentences.cn: 经过两个星期平静之后,地面战又突然爆发了.

sentences.en: Hung - chien knew this was the lull before the storm.
sentences.cn: 鸿 渐 知道这是暴风雨前的静寂.

sentences.en: Is it not everyone's concern to lull a child with soothing songs and kind looks?
sentences.cn: 我们不是用甜蜜的歌声与和善的目光催眠孩子 吗 ?

sentences.en: It was the lull before the storm.
The drug put Murphy in a lull for thirty minutes.
sentences.cn: 药物使摩菲安静了三十分钟.

sentences.en: The drug put Simpson in a lull for thirty minutes.
sentences.cn: 药物使辛普森安静了30分钟.

sentences.en: The hum of the tyres on the road lulled her to sleep.
sentences.cn: 一路上滚滚的车轮声使她昏昏欲睡。

sentences.en: The sights and sounds of such a night lull pain and grief to rest.
sentences.cn: 象这种夜间的景色和声音,才能催眠着痛苦和烦恼,叫它们好好地安睡.

sentences.en: There was a lull in political violence after the election of the current president.
sentences.cn: 现任总统当选之后，政治暴力进入了一段暂时的平静期。

sentences.en: This is just the lull before the storm.
sentences.cn: 这只是暴风雨前的暂时平静.

sentences.en: This will lull them into a false sense of security.
sentences.cn: 这会使他们产生一种虚假的安全感.

sentences.en: With the shutters half-closed and the calm airy height of the room to lull me, I soon fell into a doze.
sentences.cn: 半掩的百叶窗和宁静、通风的高大房间催我入睡，我很快便打起盹来。

trans.tran_cn: 暂停，间歇，暂时平静，催眠的东西
trans.tran_en: A lull is a period of quiet or calm in a longer period of activity or excitement
to make someone feel calm or as if they want to sleep

trans.tran_cn: 平静，安静，平息，减弱，停止
使镇静，使安静，哄，哄骗，使入睡
